name: cssfilter
description: Sanitize untrusted CSS with a configuration specified by a Whitelist. 根据白名单过滤CSS

scripts.test: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -t 5000 -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build

author: Zongmin Lei <leizongmin@gmail.com>
